title: Optimizing testing feedback in introductory chemistry: a multi-treatment study exploring varying levels of assessment feedback and subsequent performance
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4RP00077C, Paper
Kristen Murphy, David Glenn Schreurs, Melonie Teichert, Cynthia J. Luxford, Jaclyn Trate, Jordan T. Harshman, Jamie L Schneider
Providing students with feedback on their performance is a critical part of enhancing student learning in chemistry and is often integrated into homework assignments, quizzes, and exams. However, not all...
